Class Student

java.lang.Object
studentmanager.Student
public class Student extends Object
Represents a student with personal information and subject grades. Each student is assigned a unique ID and may have grades recorded for multiple predefined subjects.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(int id, String fName, String mName, String lName, Character gender)
      Constructs a student with full name and gender.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique student ID.
      fName - The student's first name.
      mName - The student's middle name (can be blank).
      lName - The student's last name.
      gender - The student's gender ('M', 'F', or 'U').

    • GetFullDetails

      public void GetFullDetails()
      Display a student's full details (full name, gender, average grade).

    • enterGrade

      public void enterGrade(Subjects subject, float num) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds or updates a grade for a given subject.
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject to assign a grade for.
      num - The grade value (0â€“100).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if grade is out of valid range.

    • SetId

      public void SetId(int id)

    • GetId

      public int GetId()

    • calculateAverageGrade

      public float calculateAverageGrade()
      Calculates the average grade of the student's known subject grade.
      Returns:
      The numerical average grade of student's known subject grade of type float.

    • GetAverageGrade

      public Character GetAverageGrade()
      Determine the alphabetical grade based on the student's average grade
      Returns:
      A letter e.g A,B,C,F or N based on the average grade.

    • toFileString

      public String toFileString()
      Converts the student data into a CSV-compatible string for saving to file.
      Returns:
      A single-line string representing the student and their grades.

    • fromFileString

      public static Student fromFileString(String line)
      Reconstructs a Student object from a line in the file.
      Parameters:
      line - A comma-separated string in the expected file format.
      Returns:
      A Student object with parsed values and grades.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if format is invalid or enum parsing fails.
